description:
Downloaded in over 140 countries! Big Hit Application!! 100,000 downloads in
1 month!!

Made by collaboration of the app winning 2011 KIDS DESIGN AWARD and Dora-Kids, 
the leading Japanese educational program for early childhood developed by Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions Co., Ltd.

-Basic Information
 "Shuffle Fun" is the newest shuffle app series for kids created by Dora-Kids, 
the leading Japanese educational program for early childhood developed by 
Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions Co., Ltd. and the app "Shuffle Nurie" series, 
the winner of 2011 KIDS DESIGN AWARD.
This app is made for 1 to 6 year-old children that enables them to learn 
the names of animals,dinosaurs and sea animals with cute animations.

Let's put the animals,dinosaurs and sea animals back into their original figure!
The picture card of each animal or dinosaur or sea animal is divided into three parts. 
When you put the original figure together, they will start introducing themselves!

"Shuffle Fun" is an educational app teaching the names of animals,dinosaurs and sea animals with full of amusing sounds and animations that stimulate the childrens' five senses.

You can play and combine more than 3,000 patterns of animals,dinosaurs and sea animals.
Try to create your own creature!
Expand your imagination and have fun in making unique combinations.
We hope you will enjoy spending time with your children using this app.

-For Ages 1 to 6

-Free Edition
Five items from animals or dinosaurs or sea animals will be randomly picked out from the regular game edition.
The creatures in this edition sometimes change.
